1: אֶפְרַ֜יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> רֹעֶ֥ה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>feedeth</n> ר֙וּחַ֙ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>on wind</n> וְרֹדֵ֣ף <sup>7291 </sup> <n>and followeth</n> קָדִ֔ים <sup>6921 </sup> <n>after the east wind</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>he</n> הַיּ֕וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>he daily</n> כָּזָ֥ב <sup>3577 </sup> <n>lies</n> וָשֹׁ֖ד <sup>7701 </sup> <n>and desolation</n> יַרְבֶּ֑ה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>increaseth</n> וּבְרִית֙ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>a covenant</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> אַשּׁ֣וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>with the Assyrians</n> יִכְרֹ֔תוּ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>and they do make</n> וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <sup>8081 </sup> <n>and oil</n> לְמִצְרַ֥יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>into Egypt</n> יוּבָֽל׃ <sup>2986 </sup> <n>is carried</n>
2: וְרִ֥יב <sup>7379 </sup> <n>hath also a controversy</n> לַֽיהוָ֖ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> יְהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>with Judah</n> וְלִפְקֹ֤ד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and will punish</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> יַעֲקֹב֙ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>Jacob</n> כִּדְרָכָ֔יו <sup>1870 </sup> <n>according to his ways</n> כְּמַעֲלָלָ֖יו <sup>4611 </sup> <n>according to his doings</n> יָשִׁ֥יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>will he recompense</n> לֽוֹ׃
3: בַּבֶּ֖טֶן <sup>990 </sup> <n>in the womb</n> עָקַ֣ב <sup>6117 </sup> <n>by the heel</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אָחִ֑יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>He took his brother</n> וּבְאוֹנ֖וֹ <sup>202 </sup> <n>and by his strength</n> שָׂרָ֥ה <sup>8280 </sup> <n>he had power</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>with God</n>
4: וָיָּ֤שַׂר <sup>7786 </sup> <n>Yea he had power</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>with</n> מַלְאָךְ֙ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>over the angel</n> וַיֻּכָ֔ל <sup>3201 </sup> <n>and prevailed</n> בָּכָ֖ה <sup>1058 </sup> <n>he wept</n> וַיִּתְחַנֶּן־ <sup>2603 </sup> <n>and made supplication</n> ל֑וֹ בֵּֽית־ אֵל֙ <sup>1008 </sup> <n>him [in] Bethel</n> יִמְצָאֶ֔נּוּ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>unto him he found</n> וְשָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>and there</n> יְדַבֵּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and there he spake</n> עִמָּֽנוּ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>Even</n>
5: וַֽיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Even the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> הַצְּבָא֑וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> זִכְרֽוֹ׃ <sup>2143 </sup> <n>[is] his memorial</n>
6: וְאַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> בֵּאלֹהֶ֣יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thou to thy God</n> תָשׁ֑וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Therefore turn</n> חֶ֤סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>mercy</n> וּמִשְׁפָּט֙ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and judgment</n> שְׁמֹ֔ר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>keep</n> וְקַוֵּ֥ה <sup>6960 </sup> <n>and wait</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>for</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>on thy God</n> תָּמִֽיד׃ <sup>8548 </sup> <n>continually</n>
7: כְּנַ֗עַן <sup>3667 </sup> <n>[He is] a merchant</n> בְּיָד֛וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>[are] in his hand</n> מֹאזְנֵ֥י <sup>3976 </sup> <n>the balances</n> מִרְמָ֖ה <sup>4820 </sup> <n>of deceit</n> לַעֲשֹׁ֥ק <sup>6231 </sup> <n>to oppress</n> אָהֵֽב׃ <sup>157 </sup> <n>he loveth</n>
8: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֶפְרַ֔יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>And Ephraim</n> אַ֣ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Surely</n> עָשַׁ֔רְתִּי <sup>6238 </sup> <n>Yet I am become rich</n> מָצָ֥אתִי <sup>4672 </sup> <n>I have found me out</n> א֖וֹן <sup>202 </sup> <n>substance</n> לִ֑י כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יְגִיעַ֕י <sup>3018 </sup> <n>[in] all my labours</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>No</n> יִמְצְאוּ־ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>they shall find</n> לִ֖י עָוֹ֥ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>none iniquity</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> חֵֽטְא׃ <sup>2399 </sup> <n>in me that [were] sin</n>
9: וְאָנֹכִ֛י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And I [that am] the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>from the land</n> מִצְרָ֑יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> עֹ֛ד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> אוֹשִֽׁיבְךָ֥ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>will yet make thee to dwell</n> בָאֳהָלִ֖ים <sup>168 </sup> <n>in tabernacles</n> כִּימֵ֥י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>as in the days</n> מוֹעֵֽד׃ <sup>4150 </sup> <n>of the solemn feast</n>
10: וְדִבַּ֙רְתִּי֙ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>I have also spoken</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <sup>5030 </sup> <n>by the prophets</n> וְאָנֹכִ֖י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> חָז֣וֹן <sup>2377 </sup> <n>visions</n> הִרְבֵּ֑יתִי <sup>7235 </sup> <n>and I have multiplied</n> וּבְיַ֥ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>by the ministry</n> הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <sup>5030 </sup> <n>of the prophets</n> אֲדַמֶּֽה׃ <sup>1819 </sup> <n>and used similitudes</n>
11: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> גִּלְעָ֥ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>Gilead</n> אָ֙וֶן֙ <sup>205 </sup> <n>[Is there] iniquity</n> אַךְ־ <sup>389 </sup> <n>also</n> שָׁ֣וְא <sup>7723 </sup> <n>are worthless</n> הָי֔וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בַּגִּלְגָּ֖ל <sup>1537 </sup> <n>in Gilgal</n> שְׁוָרִ֣ים <sup>7794 </sup> <n>bullocks</n> זִבֵּ֑חוּ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>they sacrifice</n> גַּ֤ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Yes</n> מִזְבְּחוֹתָם֙ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>yea their altars</n> כְּגַלִּ֔ים <sup>1530 </sup> <n>[are] as heaps</n> עַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Beside</n> תַּלְמֵ֥י <sup>8525 </sup> <n>in the furrows</n> שָׂדָֽי׃ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the fields</n>
12: וַיִּבְרַ֥ח <sup>1272 </sup> <n>fled</n> יַעֲקֹ֖ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>And Jacob</n> שְׂדֵ֣ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>into the country</n> אֲרָ֑ם <sup>758 </sup> <n>of Syria</n> וַיַּעֲבֹ֤ד <sup>5647 </sup> <n>served</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>and Israel</n> בְּאִשָּׁ֔ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>for a wife</n> וּבְאִשָּׁ֖ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>and for a wife</n> שָׁמָֽר׃ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>he kept</n>
13: וּבְנָבִ֕יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>And by a prophet</n> הֶעֱלָ֧ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>brought</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>out of Egypt</n> וּבְנָבִ֖יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>and by a prophet</n> נִשְׁמָֽר׃ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>was he preserved</n>
14: הִכְעִ֥יס <sup>3707 </sup> <n>provoked [him] to anger</n> אֶפְרַ֖יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> תַּמְרוּרִ֑ים <sup>8563 </sup> <n>most bitterly</n> וְדָמָיו֙ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>his blood</n> עָלָ֣יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> יִטּ֔וֹשׁ <sup>5203 </sup> <n>therefore shall he leave</n> וְחֶ֨רְפָּת֔וֹ <sup>2781 </sup> <n>upon him and his reproach</n> יָשִׁ֥יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>return</n> ל֖וֹ אֲדֹנָֽיו׃ <sup>136 </sup> <n>his Lord</n>
